nodes.text: The Federation of the Double Worlds (also called Fed-Dub) was the government of Talus and Tralus, the Twin Worlds of the Corellian system.
The Federation of the Double Worlds was an elected government that ruled Talus and Tralus. The Fed-Dub controlled a minor military force to keep the peace on these two planets.

Formed in 500 BBY, it was independent of the central government on Corellia, and often maintained adversarial relationships with the other planets of the system. In 470 BBY, Corellia, Drall, and Selonia attempted to take over the planets, which lead to even more tense relations with the other planets. Fed-Dub was headquartered on Talus, and had authority over both Talus and Tralus, as well as Centerpoint Station.

During the Galactic Civil War, Fed-Dub's military force was struggling against many criminal and terrorist organizations present on Talus, including the Binayre Pirates, the Tralus and Talus Liberation Party, the Lost Aqualishs and the Drall Patriots.
During the Second Galactic Civil War, Fed-Dub became part of the Confederation.
